short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Manages session timers based on tab selections.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
About
Auto Session Timer extensions helps you record session time on cases automatically and stops recording on case when you switch to a new case.
Make sure no active session timer is running on case before switching on auto session timer.
Once the session timer is enabled, make sure to refresh the browser for auto session timer to start recording on cases

Features
Enable/Disable Session Timer
Record session time on cases automatically
Added support to allow users to configure alert threshold.
